title: [The Flying potato]
creator_credit: Tarnagulla and Marong Primary Schools and Paul Fletcher
brief_description: Work created by students from Tarnagulla and Marong primary schools with animator Paul Fletcher as part of the artists in schools program sponsored by the Department of Education and Arts Victoria. Contains original artwork by the students (from lower primary levels) that has been animated by the artist, footage of the students and animations created by the older students. Storyline is minimal but includes a flying potato adventure, a monster circus and experimental animation.
